name: ProcGenIslands
description:
A procedurally generated island explorer. Explore the infinite world, discovering artifacts and new biomes, or sit back and relax.

Space: Take screenshot

Tab: Toggle map

Hold Left click + drag: move map

Scroll wheel: zoom map

In water:

LeftArrow/RightArrow: Turn

UpArrow/DownArrow: Accelerate

On land:

Arrow keys to move

Made for Virtual Code Day 2020.

Still very work in progress, I will be adding more updates soon!
